verses.text: ‘OKU mau fakafeta‘i kiate koe, ‘Elohimi, ‘oku mau fakafeta‘i He ko ho huafa ‘oku ofi mai: ‘Oku toutou tala ia ‘e ho‘o ngaahi ngāue tu‘utai.
“Ka a‘u ki hoku nima ‘a e taimi kuo kotofa, Te u fakamaau totonu ‘a e me‘a.
He ngali mokulu koā ‘a māmani mo hono nofo ‘ona– ‘Ā, ko au na‘a ku fokotu‘u hono pou, ‘o u fua ke fe‘unga.” (Sila)
Kuo u pehē ki he fakamālohi, ‘Oua te mou fakamālohi pea ki he kau angahala, ‘Oua te mou nifo hihiki:
‘Oua ‘e hiki homou nifo ki ‘olunga; ‘Oua ‘e lea mei he kia fiematamu‘a.
He ‘oku ‘ikai ke ha‘u mei he hopo‘anga la‘ā pe mei hono tō‘anga, ‘Io, ‘oku ‘ikai ha‘u hoto hiki mei he toafa.
He ko eni ia ‘a e fakamaau, ‘a ‘Elohimi: Ko e taha ko ē ‘oku ne hifo, ko e taha ko ē ‘oku ne hiki.

He ‘oku ‘i ai ha ipu ‘i he nima ‘o Sihova, Pea ‘oku sovinivini hono uaine he fonua ‘i he me‘a fakakakala; Pea ‘oku ne fakatau mei ai ‘e ia: Tala atu ko hono efe ‘o‘ona Ko e kau angahala ‘o māmani te nau tatau, ‘o inumia.
Ka ko au te u fakahā ma‘u pē; Te u hiva saame ki he ‘Otua ‘o Sēkope.
Pea ko e ngaahi nifo ‘o e kau angahala te u paki; Ka ko e nifo ‘o e kau mā‘oni‘oni ‘e mahiki.
